messages.subject: Hitler went to heaven
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/24/02 3:55:27 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/24/02 3:55:27 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Well, I knew I wouldn't get any from you since you and I think exactly the
same way, but
I was all ready for some fighting and I didn't get any. Maybe that can of
worms was
too big. :-) >>

Well, I don't have any need to fight with you on this one, even though I
totally disagree.
I think if Hitler is in heaven, I sure as Hell don't want to be there.
If anyone deserves torment more than that man, I can't think of many. Sorry,
that's how I see it.
But I think your belief is just that, yours. It isn't an unschooling issue,
and I feel no need to get you to think any differently on the issue. So why
fight? I'll save my boxing gloves for other issues. :)

Ren
